lead_paragraph: BLACKWELL KONOWITCH --Judith, 59, of Irvington, NY. Grew up in Manhasset, Long Island. She work diligently to improve education. Survived by her beloved husband and best friend Paul Konowitch, her loving children Jeffrey and Margo Konowitch, her loving mother Marie Blackwell Deppen and devoted sister Nancy Semels (Daniel). Visiting Sunday (today) 5-7pm Edwards-Dowdle Funeral Home, 64 Ashford Ave., Dobbs Ferry, NY. Service Monday 7:00pm Temple Beth Shalom, 740 N. Broadway, Hastings-on-Hudson, NY. Memorials to the Judith Blackwell Konowitch Scholarship Award, Checks should be made to the Dobbs Ferry Schools Foundation, JBK Award, DFSF Treasurer, 505 Broadway, Dobbs Ferry, NY 10522. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLACKWELL KONOWITCH, JUDITH
